title: Code of Kaius
text: While the [[Galifar Code of Justice|Code of Galifar]] provides the basis for civil rights in [[Karrnath]], the Code of Kaius that developed from it over the last few hundred years is more rigid and less forgiving; its laws and regulations almost promote a society where might makes right. Indeed, the nation has labored under martial law since the earliest days of the [[Last War]].
